About Me

Hello there!

Welcome to my page! Developing technologies for the mind to advance humankind is a vision that I strongly believe in.

I am a graduate student at Arizona State University . I'm pursuing Masters in Computer Science at Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering. I have my Bachelors in Computer Science from PES Institute of Technology, India and interned as a Researcher at Defense Research and Development Organization. After my undergrad, I was working at Electronics for Imaging as an Associate Software Engineer. I'm very keen on delving further into the intricacies of Machine Learning and Deep Learning and I have an insatiable hunger to learn new technologies.

I'm currently staying in Tempe, Arizona, United States of America. I love to travel and I'm a foodie! Currently, I'm seeking Software Engineering internship opportunities for Summer 2020. Feel free to connect with me and say hello!
